author: covener
msg: +  *) mod_dir: Prevent the internal identifier "httpd/unix-directory" from
+     appearing as a Content-Type response header when requests for a directory

author: markt
msg: I can't see a reason for this to depend on available(). The dispatch should only happen if there is data to read.

I can see good reasons for this not to depend on available(). The AsyncStateMachine has different behaviour on some state changes if it thinks async I/O is being used. With this test in place it was possible for some of those actions to be skipped.

msg: Move '.' inside the code tag, where it belongs and mark up the locale 'fr' as code.
